mapper.insert: INSERT INTO T_PROJECT_I18N ( F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID, F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID, F_TITLE, F_DESCRIPTION, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT ) VALUES ( #{ ownerProjectId }, #{ targetLocaleId }, #{ title }, #{ description }, (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) )
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROJECT_I18N SET F_TITLE = #{ title }, F_DESCRIPTION = #{ description }, F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = (strftime('%s', 'now') * 1000) WHERE F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId } AND F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId } AND F__LAST_UPDATED_AT = #{ _lastUpdatedAt }
mapper.select: SELECT T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID AS "targetLocaleId", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || '/I18n)' AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title", T3.F_TITLE AS "target_title" FROM T_PROJECT_I18N T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID LEFT JOIN T_LOCALE T3 ON T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = T3.F_LOCALE_ID WHERE T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId } AND T1.F_TARGET_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId }
SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_PROJECT_I18N T1

SELECT T1.F_PROJECT_ID AS "projectId", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME AS "projectName", T1.F_GRADLE_NAME AS "gradleName", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F_NOTE AS "note", T1.F_COPYRIGHTS AS "copyrights", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' AS "_title" FROM T_PROJECT T1 WHERE T1.F_PROJECT_ID = #{ ownerProjectId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_PROJECT T1
T1.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T1.F_TITLE || ')' LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'

SELECT T1.F_LOCALE_ID AS "localeId", T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID AS "ownerProjectId", T1.F_TITLE AS "title", T1.F_DESCRIPTION AS "description", T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT AS "_lastUpdatedAt", T1.F_TITLE AS "_title", T2.F_PROJECT_NAME || '(' || T2.F_TITLE || ')' AS "owner_title" FROM T_LOCALE T1 LEFT JOIN T_PROJECT T2 ON T1.F_OWNER_PROJECT_ID = T2.F_PROJECT_ID WHERE T1.F_LOCALE_ID = #{ targetLocaleId }

SELECT MAX(T1.F__LAST_UPDATED_AT) AS "max_lastUpdatedAt", COUNT(*) AS "count", 0 AS "focus" FROM T_LOCALE T1
T1.F_TITLE LIKE '%' || #{hint} || '%'
